When setting `useBuiltIns: 'usage'`, polyfills are automatically imported when needed.
  Please remove the direct import of `@babel/polyfill` or use `useBuiltIns: 'entry'` instead.

  When setting `useBuiltIns: 'usage'`, polyfills are automatically imported when needed.
  Please remove the direct import of `@babel/polyfill` or use `useBuiltIns: 'entry'` instead.

  When setting `useBuiltIns: 'usage'`, polyfills are automatically imported when needed.
  Please remove the direct import of `@babel/polyfill` or use `useBuiltIns: 'entry'` instead.

  Please remove the direct import of `@babel/polyfill` or use `useBuiltIns: 'entry'` instead.
